roleset.name: mend someone's hurt feelings

role.descr: hurt feelings, or person with hurt feelings

example.name: person with feelings
example.text: Like all Americans seeking chronic prosperity, [I]*-3 do find it necessary [*]to plunge certain funds into conservative monetary tools, if only [*-3] to assuage my father-in-law, who believes in such things.
example.arg: my father-in-law, who believes in such things.

example.name: feelings themselves
example.text: Instead, he says, if the salespeople can get the customers to consider Wang's products on their merits, [he or a top financial will try [*]to assuage the fears about finances.
